name: MAG Bookkeeping
tag_list: mag, bryan-miles, shannon-miles, church-outsourcing, church-payroll, church-bookkeeping, cloud-staffing, bryanmiles, shannonkmiles, magbookkeeping, church-leaders, ministry-bookkeeping, pastor, mag-bookkeeping, miles-advisory-group
overview:
MAG Bookkeeping helps busy pastors and growing churches by serving as their virtual church bookkeeper connected to the duties of church accounting and payroll. Leveraging web-based technologies and deploying highly-qualified virtual bookkeepers, all based in the United States, they provide clients with real people with huge hearts for ministry. All working virtually to efficiently meet their clients’ bookkeeping needs so they can protect and grow their leadership focus. Churches of many sizes call on MAG Bookkeeping when critical bookkeeping/accounting/payroll challenges arise because they understand the urgency of NOW and the consequences of lack of focus.

As a leading national firm, MAG Bookkeeping serves its Church Clients all throughout the United States. The company is comprised of seasoned leaders who have deep insight tied to virtual/cloud workforces. They know how to move quickly, responsively, objectively, and thoroughly to integrate into a client’s church environment and staff … delivering immediate wins.

The skill to adapt quickly to Church Clients’ situations reflects the ability at MAG Bookkeeping to attract and retain the best and brightest church bookkeepers in the country. MAG Bookkeeping is a preferred solution provider for highly talented church bookkeepers who can fulfill the requirements of a rigorous selection process.

MAG Bookkeeping is a Brand of the Miles Advisory Group, Inc.
